english.query: Who is the Prime Minister of UAE?
english.response: As of my knowledge cutoff in 2023, the President of the UAE was Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, who serves as the Vice President and Prime Minister of the UAE.

arabic.query: من هو رئيس وزراء الإمارات العربية المتحدة؟
arabic.response: أما عن رئيس البلاد ف: Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan
